title.rendered: What are foundation models, and how can they help implement AI at scale?

<title>What Are Foundation AI Models Exactly? — ITRex</title>
<meta name="description" content="Foundation AI models are machine learning models trained on tremendous volumes of unlabeled data. Serving as a basis for various AI applications, foundation models can help you tap into artificial intelligence on a budget, scale AI company wide, and get ROI faster." />
